title: Fortis
description: At the prime age of twenty-one, I had only kissed one man—that was seven years ago—another life, a life full of pain and sorrows. One I tried to forget. I turned my back on my birthright despite my parent’s last wishes. Now, I must return to my childhood home, but I am afraid to face the horrors long forgotten. My past was behind me. However, I also wonder if my future awaits me—the barbaric man who kissed me—one who left his imprint in my soul from just one kiss. Fortis Novelette (15k words) of Tatia and Viktor’s StoryStandalone (It is not part of Fortis' Series)Warning: Adult scenes included
author: P.C. Benson
